column2: "Ana ɔwo inyim mber a botan do iwi dze wo? Anaa ɔwo ehyɛ aber a ndoa dze ko awoo nsew?"
"Ana ɔwo ekan abosoom dodow a hɔn efur dze nyin? Anaa ɔwo inyim mber a wɔdze wo?"
"Wɔkotow wɔwo hɔn mba
column3: Wɔtow hɔn yaw kyen."

column2: "Hɔn mba kokwa
column3: wonyin wɔ haban mu; Wofir edzi kɔ

column2: "Woana na oegyaa hamu asoaso dɛ ɔmfa noho ndzi? Anaa woana na ɔasan hamu asoaso nkyehoma?"
"Nyia medze sar pradada no ayɛ ne fi
column3: Na nkyen asaase no yɛ ne tsenabea."

column2: "Ɔsereserew kurow ne gyigyeegye
column3: Nkyii so ɔnntse ɔkafo ntseatseamu no."

column2: "Mbepɔw do nkyinii nye n’edzidzibea
column3: Na odzi adze momon biara ekyir."

column2: "Aso ɔnantwi bɔyafo bɛpen dɛ ɔsom wo? Anaa ɔbɛtsena wo mbowa edzidzidaka ho?"
"Ana ɔwo edze ahoma bɛsa ɔnantwi bɔyafo wɔ funtumka ho? Anaa obofuntum abɔn no edzi w’ekyir?"
"Ana ebɔtwer no
column3: osiandɛ n’ahoɔdzen so ntsi? Anaa ibegyaa w’edwuma mu ama no?"

column2: "Ana ebɛgye no edzi dɛ ɔno na ɔdze w’aba bɛba fie
column3: Na ɔaboa w’ewuporoweebea eburow no ano?"

column2: "Sohor bɔ n’atsaban mu ehurusidzi mu; Ana ne ntsaban na ne ntɛkyerɛ tse dɛ esukɔnkɔn dze?"
"Ɔtow na ogyaa ne nkyirefuwa wɔ asaase do
column3: Na ɔbɔ no hyew wɔ huntuma mu."

column2: "Na no werɛ fir dɛ anan botum adwerew no
column3: Anaa abowa bɔyafo betsiatsia do."

column2: "Ɔyɛ etsiɔdzen wɔ ne mba do
column3: dɛ gyama wɔnnyɛ nedze: Kaansa ne berɛ yɛ gyan mpo a

column2: "Osiandɛ Nyankopɔn ama nyansa abɔ no
column3: Nkyii so ɔamma no ntseasee."

column2: "Aber a ɔma noho do wɔ sor no
column3: Ɔsereserew pɔnkɔ na no do tsefo."

column2: "Ana ɔwo edze pɔnkɔ n’ahoɔdzen maa no? Anaa ɔwo edze nhwi hugyaa ahyehyɛ no kɔn?"
"Ana ɔwo na ayɛ no ma ohuruhuruw dɛ abɛbɛw yi? Ma no hwenmubɔ ne dzenyɛ tu akoma yi?"
"Ɔtwerɛw bɔnsa mu
column3: na odzi ehurusi wɔ n’ahoɔdzen mu: Opue kehyia akofo a woemia."

column2: "Osi suro atwetwe
column3: na n’abaw mu mmbu; Nkyii so ɔnnsan ekyir mmfi afona enyim."

column2: "Egyen kotoku wosow wɔ no do
column3: Peaa na egyen menaba gyaframee so."

column2: "Ɔdze enyiber gyigyeegye men asaase no; Nkyii so ɔnngye nndzi dɛ ɔyɛ abɛn ndze."
"Mpɛn dodow a abɛn hɛn no
column3: nna ɔtsea mu dɛ
column4: Yɛɛ! Na ɔtse ko hua wɔ ekyirekyir

column2: "Ana ɔnam wo nyansaa do na akrɔma tu
column3: Na ɔtserɛw ne ntsaban mu wɔ pomu afamu?"

column2: "Ana ɔnam w’anosɛm do na ɔkɔrpɔn ma noho do
column3: Na ɔyɛ no buw wɔ sor?"

column2: "Ɔtse botan do
column3: na ɔwɔ ne dabew wɔ hɔ

column2: "Hɔ na ofi serasera afonam; N’enyiwa hu no ekyirekyir."
"Ne mba so hwiew bɔgya: Na mbrɛ atɔfo wɔ no
column3: hɔ na ɔwɔ."
